message: Let's start fair, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
You started with a 60/40 split, I'm offering a 4-to-1 ratio in my favor, but with a slightly more generous offer for you this time
Okay, I'm willing to negotiate. Let's try a 45/55 split in your favor. I'm losing money every round too, so I can't go much lower than that.
